name: There Mows The Neighbourhood
description:
An entry for GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the Theme "Out of control". Please note that this has been a solo endeavour in a very limited time frame so please set your expectations accordingly - this is more of a fun proof of concept than full game at this stage. All code (apart from boiler plate stuff such as input handling), art assets, shaders, sound effects etc. were created by myself in this time, aside from the character models which are courtesy of Synty and the grass alpha channel which was created by Kenney.

The concept of the game it to thoroughly mow your lawn with a somewhat unruly strimmer, attempting to cause as little harm/damage in the process as possible.

Keyboard/Mouse
WASD / Arrow Keys / Mouse - Move
Left Click / Space - Start the strimmer
R - Restart
Esc - Exit

Gamepad
Left Thumbstick - Move
A - Start the strimmer
Back - Restart
Start - Exit
